honorifics.policy: Honorifics should generally be localized to convey appropriate levels of respect or familiarity in English, avoiding direct translation unless culturally significant and explained. Contextual cues (e.g., first name vs. last name, casual vs. formal address) should guide choices.

name_order.policy: For Japanese characters, use Japanese name order by default (Family Name Given Name) across metadata and translation guidance. Keep canonical spelling, and only use Given Name Family Name for explicit non-Japanese exceptions.

周.notes: Initially stoic, lonely, self-indulgent, and apathetic about his appearance and surroundings. Becomes more confident, caring, and open after starting to date Mahiru.
